text: the tinderbox a long time ago lived a

what will you use that old box for it is

there were only a few small coins he had

this is too much for me to handle but

the dog was back in a wink there on the

they began to shout but the Queen was

I confess I used the tinder box to reach

tinderbox yes your majesty
an old witch wished for it but I thought

the princess smiled for she thought he

I will be her tinderbox I will work hard
